Name: Negus (Hot)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Place bar spoon in warmed glass. POUR all ingredients into glass and STIR.
History: Colonel Francis Negus was the MP for Ipswich, England from 1717 to 1732. He created this diluted version of the original Bishop.
Nutrition: One serving of Negus (Hot) contains 195 calories
Garnish: Dust with grated nutmeg (and optional cinnamon stick)
